briefTitle: 5-element Music Therapy on Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Clinical Efficacy Study on 5-element Music Therapy on Patients With Physically and Psychologically Unbalance After Breast Cancer Surgery
conditions: Breast Cancer Female, Quality of Life, Depression, Anxiety
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change From Baseline in Self-Rating Anxiety Scale (SAS) score at 3 Months
